    • Method Detail

      • generateFileId

        public static java.lang.String generateFileId()
                                       throws CarrierException
        Generate unique file identifier with random algorithm. Application can call this function to explicitly generate transfer file id, or let file transfer module generate file id implicitly.
        Returns:
        The generated unique file identifier.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • close

        public void close()
        Close file transfer instance.

      • getFileId

        public java.lang.String getFileId(java.lang.String filename)
                           throws CarrierException
        Get an unique file identifier of specified file. Each file has its unique file id used between two peers.
        Parameters:
        filename - [in] The target file name.
        Returns:
        File id is returned if file transfer instance has file info of filename.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String fileId)
                             throws CarrierException
        Get file name by file id. Each file has its unique file id used between two peers.
        Parameters:
        fileId - [in] The target file identifier.
        Returns:
        File name is returned if file transfer instance has file id specified.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws CarrierException
        Send a file transfer connect request to target peer.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • acceptConnect

        public void acceptConnect()
                   throws CarrierException
        Accept file transfer connection request.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • addFile

        public void addFile(FileTransferInfo fileinfo)
             throws CarrierException
        Add a file to queue of file transfer.
        Parameters:
        fileinfo - [in] Information of the file to be added.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • pullData

        public void pullData(java.lang.String fileId,
                     long offset)
              throws CarrierException
        To send pull request to transfer file with specified fileId.
        Parameters:
        fileId - [in] The file identifier.
        offset - [in] The offset of file where transfer begins.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

      • writeData

        public int writeData(java.lang.String fileId,
                     byte[] data,
                     int offset,
                     int len)
              throws CarrierException
        To transfer file data with specified fileId.
        Parameters:
        fileId - [in] The file identifier.
        data - [in] The data to transfer for file.
        offset - [in] The start offset.
        len - [in] The bytes to write.
        Returns:
        Bytes of data sent on success.
        Throws:
        CarrierException

                           java.lang.String reason)
